content: QuoteGuys, I have some sealed cold custom wallets, one of which will be raffled off in this thread! I took into account your wishes (regarding the lottery from 0 to 99) and I want to say that the lottery structure will remain the same with the difference that there will be at least 6 rounds! Good luck!Free shipping!I will announce the block number when we are full.Your forum account must be registered no later than September 1 of the current year.How this will work:Select a slot on a first-come, first-served basis. I will choose a block whose last symbol of the hash will determine the winner.0 - Â owlcatz1 - Â WhyFhy2 - Â Krog3 - Â Suzuki Matt4 - Â Dernoste5 - Â Hox6 - Â Markzellers7 - Â TheNovemberMan8 - Â Saxoshi9 - Â Bullion-n-BTCa - Â QuakerBullb - Â CoinEraserc - Â PM-ICTd - Â YodasRedRockete - Â tweetiousf - Â  haloxonThis is the second round out of 6, and I can say with confidence that the winner of the first round was satisfied!Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on November 01, 2022, 03:01:20 PMArrived today! thanks!
